# init(idiom:)

**Initializer**

Creates a new bar appearance object that targets the specified idiom.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init(idiom: UIUserInterfaceIdiom)
```

## Parameters

- **idiom**: The device idiom to target. If you specify an idiom that doesnâ€™t make sense for the current device, this method adjusts the idiom to an appropriate value.

## Return Value

A new bar appearance object containing default values for the specified idiom.

## Creating a custom bar appearance object

- **init(barAppearance:)**: Creates a new bar appearance object by copying relevant data from the specified appearance object.
- **init()**: Creates a new bar appearance object containing default values.
- **init(coder:)**: Creates an appearance object from data in an unarchiver.
